Item.sqlserver_body: CREATE UNIQUE NONCLUSTERED INDEX [IX_xclass_source_id_ref_id] ON [innovator].[XCLASS] ( [SOURCE_ID] ASC, [REF_ID] ASC )WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, SORT_IN_TEMPDB = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, DROP_EXISTING = OFF, ONLINE = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
Item.name: IX_xclass_source_id_ref_id
